snippet.title: Norn9: Last Era - Official Opening Trailer
snippet.description:
Return to the world of Norn9: Var Commons with Norn9: Last Era, available officially in English for the first time on the Nintendo Switch!

Twelve espers with superhuman powers brought together on a floating ship by a mysterious multinational entity known only as The World... Their story together may have ended, but their own are just beginning.
Past, present, and future converge in Norn9: Last Era’s three different story modes, including explorations of the characters’ pasts before their lives together on the ship, retellings of the events of Norn9: Var Commons from new perspectives, and tales taking place after the events of the first game. Will Koharu, Mikoto, and Nanami live peaceful, happy lives with their newfound loves, or will their pasts come back to haunt them?

KEY FEATURES
• Three different story modes, plus a comedic “what if” scenario where the characters mysteriously turn into mini versions of themselves
• Experience the events of Norn9: Var Commons from the perspective of each of the nine male characters!
• Unlock additional bonuses through the Norn+Lifen minigame featuring colorful pixel art
For more info please visit https://aksysgames.com/norn9/
